Articles.Content: Hey all! Been playing KSP since 0.17, avid space enthusiast and (hopefully) future aerospace engineer. Love the game, love the community and looking forward to future KSP features!
Welcome to the forum! I hope you have a good time here!
Welcome aboard! I'm hoping to become a physics teacher, myself.

Welcome!

My dream is to be an Astronautics and Aerospace Engineer. Only wanted this path since Oct last year. Coincidence that I got KSP at that time? I think not.
